bounties.title: Drakens Rest
bounties.hook: You heard the story of a “Mad Necromancer,” a wizened old man that preyed on a desperate town in their time of need. What Did He Create? What did it cost? And most importantly… How could it have gone so wrong?

bounties.title: Deal with Goblin Village
bounties.hook: Goblins have been raiding the outlying area and the clan needs to be dealt with. - Posted by Lord Bronzewood
